## Garlic Bread  

| Servings | Time | Source |
|:---|:---|:-------------------|
| 3-4  | 20 min | N/A | 


### Ingredients:

- &frac13; cup vegan butter
- 4 cloves garlic, finely minced
- 6 slices of bread (at least 1in thick)
- Optional Additions
  * Parsley, minced
  * Vegan Parmesan, grated
  * Salt and pepper, to taste

### Directions 

- Preheat oven to 350 degrees F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper
- Melt vegan butter in small bowl
- Mix in minced garlic into melted butter
- Coat each slice of bread with melted butter/garlic mixture on baking sheet
- Transfer baking sheet to oven and bake for 10 minutes
- Set oven to broil and bake for 1-2 more min if break is still not golden brown
